body:
Wow, this bug has been open forever. I don't remember seeing it at all. :-(

But yes, this was fixed for google/go-github#317 in 18072adbca7ee2cb2019704577a8f3f142010ba7 (https://golang.org/cl/21291) and a separate way (either alone fixes it) in c27efce66bce7534dbb357ac1779bbc08395b267 (https://golang.org/cl/21302)
